entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
